summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney to an unknown recipient forwarding a potential lead regarding Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. The lead originates from a private security contact of the AUSA's brother, a Lieutenant in the NYPD, who claims to have information and documents.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject of the potential lead, alongside Jeffrey Epstein, regarding which a private security contact claims to have information and documents.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject of the potential lead, alongside Ghislaine Maxwell, regarding which a private security contact claims to have information and documents.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of the email forwarding a potential lead about Epstein and Maxwell from their brother, an NYPD Lieutenant, to an unknown recipient (likely a colleague or law enforcement contact).

connections.description: The AUSA is forwarding an investigative lead regarding Maxwell.
The AUSA is forwarding an investigative lead regarding Epstein.
Both are named together as the subjects of the potential information and documents held by a private security contact.

events.title: Potential Lead Forwarded to FBI
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails an unknown recipient to forward a potential lead regarding Epstein and Maxwell, originating from a private security contact, and states they will pass it on to the FBI.

keyFacts: A private security contact, working for an unnamed individual with homes in New York, Florida, and the Bahamas, claims to possess information and documents regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The lead was relayed to an Assistant United States Attorney via their brother, who is a Lieutenant in the NYPD.
The AUSA states the lead will be passed on to the FBI for follow-up.
The document is an email dated April 14, 2021, indicating ongoing investigative activity related to the Epstein case after Epstein's death and Maxwell's arrest.
